page.title: 02Changes over the years
page.content:
For all its isolation, the area has felt the impact of change since the first man came nine thousand years ago. Men of the Stone Age,Iron Age,the Romans,Viking and Scots,and the growth of woollen and mining industries have all changed the natural landscape.
Occupations such as basket making,bobbin making,barrel and hoop manufacture,charcoal burning,copper and iron smelting,slate and stone quarrying have now disappeared from the valley.Now the foresty are planting larch,spruce and other conifers though hardwoods like oak,ash,birch,hazel,yew and alder are still prevalent.
